components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays to T-Mobile Network in US over Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to T-Mobile network in US over subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to T-Mobile Network in US over subset of Short Codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Orange Network In French Guiana

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Orange Network In French Guiana. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures Sending to Evatis Network in Djibouti

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery failures sending to Evatis Network in Djibouti. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve this issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: A Subset of Customers Experiencing Problems to Comment on Tickets Opened

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing issues with a subset of customers unable to comment on tickets they opened. This incident has been resolved.

We continue to experience a problem with a subset of customers unable to comment on tickets they opened. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience a problem with a subset of customers unable to comment on tickets they opened. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are investigating a problem with a subset of customers unable to comment on tickets they opened. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: The XL network in Indonesia is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 August 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 09 August 2023 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from XL Indonesia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Philippines SMS Carrier Maintenance - Globe Telecom, Smart Communications, DITO Telecommunity

incident_updates.body: The Globe Telecom, Smart Communications, and DITO Telecommunity networks in Philippines are conducting a planned maintenance from 09 August 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 09 August 2023 at 10:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Globe Telecom, Smart Communications, DITO Telecommunity handsets.

The Motiv network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 09 August 2023 at 11:20 PDT until 09 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Motiv Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Kazakhstan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2 and Altel

incident_updates.body: The Tele2 and Altel networks in Kazakhstan is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 August 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 09 August 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 and Altel Kazakhstan handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 August 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 09 August 2023 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - US Cellular

incident_updates.body: The US Cellular network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 August 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 09 August 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US Cellular US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 August 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 16 August 2023 at 15:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls from and to Twilio France phone numbers.

Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 August 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 21 August 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US handsets via a subset of US short code.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and failures to and from Twilio Japan phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 21 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 October 2023 at 16:30 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Verizon

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our carrier partner Verizon US is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 August 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 09 August 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Verizon Wireless US customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap and Lookup Identity Match
